introduction.section1: Visible from Tokyo, known throughout the world, Mount Fuji is one of the most famous peaks. Sacred mountain and a true inspiration for artists, it deserves its reputation.
introduction.section2: Trekking in summer, skiing in winter, or walking all year round in the surroundings, in the region of the five lakes, for example, you will be spoiled for choice.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

title: Mount Fuji
meta-description: Visible from Tokyo, known throughout the world, Mount Fuji is one of the most famous peaks. Sacred mountain and a true inspiration for artists, it deserves its reputation. Trekking in summer, skiing in winter, or walking all year round in the surroundings, in the region of the five lakes, for example, you will be spoiled for choice. Through our articles, discover different places to visit. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.
